text: Now is a time for news sources that might be cut off to start using "RSS" seriously because that would allow others to mirror their content, and make it possible to get it back online with just a DNS change. People thought we were being too idealistic when it was said that a benefit of syndication is that it helps route around censorship. Now in 2022, that's a very real thing. Such an inexpensive insurance policy to help make sure the news gets out.
